Jason Rogers wrote:
> 
> Setup will always be called before every test method.  If there is
> information that you want initialized OAOO, you can put it in your
> constructor.
> 
> -Jason

The constructor is called once per testMethod, since each test method
results in one instance of the TestCase subclass at hand. 

Johannes
subject: Re: [junit] Running setUp once for all tests in a test suite
